title: Collect Your Shopping
makeItEasyToShop: Collect Your Shopping makes it easy to shop for groceries and have them almost instantly delivered to your doorstep. Our app features a wide range of products, including fresh produce, pantry staples, and household essentials.
welcomeToCys: Welcome to CYS - Where Grocery Shopping is Effortless! Say goodbye to long waits and hello to a world of choices. With its key features, CYS is your key to a seamless grocery experience. Join us today and embrace convenience!
liveTrackingDescription: Collect your Shopping allows you to track your delivery in real-time, so you know exactly when to expect your order..
wideSectionDescription: Collect your Shopping offers a wide range of products to choose from, including groceries, food, pharmaceutical products and many more.
deliveredInMinutesDescription: No time to go to the store? Get everything you need delivered quickly by our verified members!
starsText: 4.7 out of 5 stars in the App Store
featuredByAppleText: Featured by Apple App Store and Google Play
featureConvenienceDescription: Collect Your Shopping allows you to order groceries and essentials from your favorite shops and have it delivered right to your door, so you donâ€™t have to leave your house or wait in long lines.
featureContributeDescription: Want to earn some extra money? Become a Collect Your Shopping deliverer. Pick-up groceries for our clients and get paid based on the distance of the delivery.
featureWideVarietyDescription: Collect Your Shopping offers a wide range of available shops, so you can try new places or stick to your favorites. With Collect Your Shopping, you have access to a variety of shopping options, including groceries, clothing, liquor and more.
orderFlowDescription: The order flow of Collect Your Shopping is as follow:
orderPlacementDescription: Customers can place an order by browsing the menu of their preferred grocery store / shop and adding items to their cart. They can also customize their order and schedule delivery time
orderProcessingDescription: Once the customer places the order, it is sent to the shop for processing and we assign a pick-upper for the delivery..
orderDeliveryDescription: The driver picks up the order from the shop and delivers it to the customers address. Customers can track the status of their order in real-time and see the location of the deliverer.
orderCompletionDescription: Once the driver delivers the order, the customer confirms receipt and can rate the deliverer. The payment is processed and the customer receives a receipt of the purchase.
innovativeDescription: We revolutionize the way you shop
trustworthyDescription: We are committed to ensuring your satisfaction
sustainableDescription: We strive for sustainability in everything we do
inclusivityDescription: Our commitment to inclusion is unconditional
positiveDescription: We believe in the power of positivity
adventurousDescription: Adventurity drives us to discover new possibilities
responsibilityDescription: We always act with the highest standards of honesty and ethics
frequentlyAskedQuestionDescription: Get answers to users most commonly asked questions.
questionCYSDescription: Collect Your Shopping is the shopping service for everything you are looking for. All your groceries, from fresh fruit and vegetables to ingredients for your dinner, but also everything you may need for a nice Friday afternoon drink or spring cleaning. We have everything and deliver it to your home, office or even the park in no time!
questionFastDeliverTitle: Why do I sometimes have to wait longer for my order?
questionFastDeliverDescription: Unfortunately, when it is busy it can sometimes take a little longer for your order to be delivered. The estimated delivery time is always indicated in the app before you place your order. If the order has not arrived after the indicated delivery time, you can contact our customer service.
questionForgotToAddTitle: I forgot to add something to my order, can I change it?
questionForgotToAddDescription: No, sorry. We will immediately start packing your order so it is impossible to make any changes after placing it.
questionDeliveryCostsDescription: The delivery costs are calculated based on the store distance from the delivery address you specified. The exact delivery costs for your current order can be found during the checkout.
signupForTheWaitList: Sign up as customer or driver!

faqs.question: What is Collect Your Shopping?
faqs.answer: Collect Your Shopping is the shopping service for everything you are looking for. All your groceries, from fresh fruit and vegetables to ingredients for your dinner, but also everything you may need for a nice Friday afternoon drink or spring cleaning. We have everything and deliver it to your home, office or even the park in no time!

faqs.question: Why do I sometimes have to wait longer for my order?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, when it is busy it can sometimes take a little longer for your order to be delivered. The estimated delivery time is always indicated in the app before you place your order. If the order has not arrived after the indicated delivery time, you can contact our customer service.

faqs.question: I forgot to add something to my order, can I change it?
faqs.answer: No, sorry. We will immediately start packing your order so it is impossible to make any changes after placing it.

faqs.question: What are the delivery costs?
faqs.answer: The delivery costs are calculated based on the store distance from the delivery address you specified. The exact delivery costs for your current order can be found during the checkout.

screenshots.title: Order Details
screenshots.desc: Access the secifics with Order Details, Dive into a comprehensive overview of your purchase, from item specifics to delivery updates. Stay informed and in control as you track your order seamlessly through this feature

screenshots.title: Driver Details
screenshots.desc: Embark on a seamless journey by joining our driver community. Experience hassle free registration and unlock a world of opportunities as you sign up to become a valued part of the CYS delivery team

screenshots.title: Driver Account
screenshots.desc: Empower out driver with the Driver Account Feature, now enhanced with CYS credit points. A rewarding experience awaits as drivers mnage their accounts seamlessly while accruing credit points, ensuring a mutually beneficial journey for both drivers and customers.

screenshots.title: Home Screen
screenshots.desc: Welcome to the heart of CYS Shopping! The Home screen is your gateway to a world of choices, promotions, and personalized recommendations. Embrace convenience right from the start.

screenshots.title: Open Store
screenshots.desc: Step into a virtual marketplace as you experience a store opened through our app. Immerse yourself in a user-friendly interface, where every aisle is just a tap away

screenshots.title: Open Item
screenshots.desc: Elevate your shopping through experience by diving deep into individual items. Our Item Opened feature provides a closer look, allowing you to make informed decisions and discover the details that matters most to you

screenshots.title: Cart Checkout
screenshots.desc: Effortlesly finalize your order with a streamline cart checkout. Confirm selections, choose your payment, and seal the deal - making your desired products just a click away.

awesomeScreenshotDesc: Explore CYS shopping and see the app in action with our awesome screenshots. Your window to a world of convenience and style.
clientTestimonialsDesc: Dive into the joy of satisfied customers in our Testimonial section. Read about seamless shopping, timely deliveries, and exceptional service, as clients share their positive experiences with CYS.
clientTestimonial: I can't believe how Collect Your Shopping App has transformed my life! As a busy professional, I've always struggled to find the time to do my grocery shopping. But with this incredible app, I've found the perfect solution!
